points.Making Data Science Accessible: The Workshops Team is here to make data science accessible to everyone! Whether you're just starting out or diving into advanced topics, our workshops are designed to help students build the skills and confidence to thrive as data scientists.
points.Hands-on Learning: We run workshops on a variety of topics, including Exploratory Data Analysis, Scikit-Learn, Generative AI Theory, LLMs, and AI Agents.

points.Building community through data: The Social Subcommittee fosters a welcoming, inclusive community by creating opportunities for members to connect, collaborate, and have fun beyond coding.
points.Networking and engagement: We organize a variety of events, including social mixers, study jams, and mentorship programs, to help members build lasting connections while growing together in the field.

points.Grow your network: Connect with various professionals through exclusive speaker events, panels, and networking sessions.
points.Enhance your Career Toolkit: Improve your resume, portfolio, and professional presence with hands-on workshops.
points.Explore Data Science: Discover diverse paths in the field and learn how to leverage your skills for success.
